name: Color Chaos (itch) (brycon)
description:
Go through a series of chaotic waves fighting against many colorful monsters. Discover all seven types of monsters as you go further. Get power up, avoid the monster, and challenge yourself to get the highest score.

Control (needs keyboard and mouse):

  • WASD to move around
  • LSHIFT or SPACE to dash (gain invincibility)
  • Aim using mouse or cursor position

This game was made in 7 days during the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 with "Let There Be Chaos" as the theme.

Assets:

  • Background is 'Rogue Fantasy "Catacombs"' by Szadi art https://szadiart.itch.io/rogue-fantasy-catacombs
  • SFX by Dustyroom https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5... and from https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/
  • Background music is "My Legendary Silver Triangle Wealth Pyramid" by Gigakoops https://freemusicarchive.org/music/gigakoops/please-bring-peace-to-the-village-o...

PS: I know that game shouldn't be licensed using CC, but the background music used required me to license this work (as SA implies). I provided another downloadable version that doesn't have the BGM (and so I think allowed to use commercially, as it is not licensed). If you have something to say, please add a comment down below.
